# Creating a Lollipop Chart in R


```{r load the libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(tsibble)
urlfile="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flynnecon/datavizf24/refs/heads/main/Lollipop%20Chart/nba_championships.csv"
```



```{r read the data}
candy <- read_csv(url(urlfile))
```
